title: Heart Lynx: Lynx Reverse Harem Serial Part 1
description: *This Serial is Available May 21st, 2019 As A Complete Story With A Bonus Chapter and An Epilogue*Pallas Shifters are dying.It is up to Lin Di last born of her mother's bloodline to find a cure to the mysterious disease killing her kind.For this she travels to Canada to attend Silverleaf College a shifter school.She expects to get in and learn the secret histories in hopes of finding a cure.But first she will find her mates, and they have been waiting for her.
author: Rosa Rojo
